GSD.description:
ax25: improve the incomplete fix to avoid UAF and NPD bugs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.11 by commit 1e1f02d36d3e73f4a24e8c95c50a796bc3662d09. For more details please see the references link.
